element.name: DESCRIPTION
element.text:
This algorithm removes duplicated geometries in a vector layer. If the input layer contains several features with the exact same geometry, only the first one is kept.
Only geometries are considered, not attributes, so even if those features with identical geometries have different attributes, only the first one will be kept in the resultign layer.

element.name: RESULT
element.text: The resulting layer which does not contain duplicated geometries.
